## Final Exercise

Exercises are opportunities to practices several concepts from a module. Most will take 15-20 minutes to complete. 

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#make temp file
temp_rmd <- tempfile(pattern = "1-intro_exercise_file_", 
                     fileext = ".Rmd")
#download file to temp file
download.file(url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/matthewhirschey/tidybiology.org/main/code/1-objects/1-intro_exercise_file.Rmd", 
              destfile = temp_rmd)

#download button
downloadthis::download_file(
  path = temp_rmd,
  button_label = "Download Rmd",
  button_type = "danger",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = TRUE
)
```
